newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC Inc Q1 shr $1.42 vs $1.27.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC Inc Q1 shr $1.42 vs $1.27.

text.p: For The Periods Ended March 31, 1997 and 1996
(Dollars in Thousands Except Common Share Data)

Note: The company reported that the consolidation of certain financial services operations resulted in a $3.5 million restructuring charge, which had a net income effect of $0.06 per share. It was included in the first quarter results.
The company reported operating earnings of $50.8 million compared to $43.0 million for the same period a year ago.
